name: environment
description: IOS Tidal Package (python) using vector notation.

scripts.git: git add . && git commit -m 'comment here' && git push -u origin master
scripts.test_decompose1: cd src && python main.py decompose --folder ../test --timeSeriesPath timeseries.csv --stationName MYNAME --stationID 1 --longitude -50 --latitude 50 --constituents Z0,M2,O1 --conFilePath timeseries.csv
scripts.test_decompose2: cd src && python main.py decompose --folder ../test --timeSeriesPath timeseries.csv --stationName MYNAME --stationID 1 --longitude -50 --latitude 50 --constituents Z0,M2,O1 --conFilePath timeseries.npy
scripts.test_decompose3: cd src && python main.py decompose --folder ../test --timeSeriesPath timeseries.csv --stationFilePath stations.csv --constituents Z0,M2,O1 --conFilePath timeseries2.csv
scripts.test_compose: cd src && python main.py decompose --folder ../test --conFilePath con.csv --constituents Z0,M2,O1 --stationIDS 65 --startDate xxx --endDate xxx --step 10 --etaOnly true --outPath outPath.csv
